title: El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail: Original Route Next XX Miles
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners     How To Create Your Sign Plan     The NHT Family of Signs and How to Use Them     Original Route Next XX Miles                  Original Route Next XX Miles Sign          This road sign is located at the beginning of an original route segment and has a secondary lower sign panel that provides how many miles there are of the original route. Consider using this sign when either very long or very short segments of original route will be signed. Use of either this sign or the Original Route BEGIN sign may be appropriate. Ask yourself: What's the best or most useful information for the public to be able to find and enjoy this segment of road? In many cases, either sign will work equally well.  Â    Other Sign Web Pages: Auto Tour Route Local Tour Route Crossing To Original Route Original Route Original Route BEGIN Original Route END Historic Site Name Site Identification - Entrance
